C D E G H I M N P S T U V 

S

setBetValue(int) - Method in class Game
Sets the current value of the bet (betValue).
showAdvicePanel() - Method in class GameBoard
Changes the visibility of the MainPanel panel and reveals the AdvicePanel panel with the cards to hold according to the best strategy.
shuffle() - Method in class Deck
Shuffles the order of the array of cards.
Simulation - Class in PokerProject
Class Simulation extends Class Game and it represents the Simulation Mode of playing Video Poker.
Simulation(int, int, int, Variants) - Constructor for class Simulation
Constructor specifying the initial balance of the player, the value to bet during all simulation, the total number of deals and the Variants of Video Poker being used.
sizeNbHands() - Method in class Statistics
Gets the length of the array with the number of times a specific possible hand occurred (winHands.length winning + 1 lost).
Statistics - Class in PokerProject
Class Statistics is responsible for analyzing the performance of the player in the game.
Statistics(String[]) - Constructor for class Statistics
Constructor specifying the possible winning hands according to the Variants being used.
